definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

pinyin: chuan2 tong3 zhong1 guo2 yi1 yao4

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 這些傳統學科以及竹製武器的使用一直延續至今。

sentences.english: The annual traditional festival Mid-Autumn Festival, countless lovers and eventually became dependents places.
sentences.chinese: 每年的中秋傳統佳節，無數的有情人終成眷宿。

sentences.english: Professional athletes were fully embraced, finally ending the tradition of amateurism at the games.
sentences.chinese: 專業運動員被完全接受，終於在比賽結束的業餘傳統。

sentences.english: The Traditional Institutionalism investigated the history regarding institution as the focus.
sentences.chinese: 傳統制度主義以制度爲中心來考察歷史。

sentences.english: I is a traditional Chinese girl with the marriage.
sentences.chinese: 我是個具有傳統婚姻觀的中國女孩。

sentences.english: In concrete construction, improvement is made to traditional suspension crossing structure.
sentences.chinese: 在具體施工中，對傳統懸索跨越結構作了改進。

sentences.english: Mr Fukuda, by contrast, has a family legacy to enshrine.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，福田康夫有參拜神廟的家庭傳統。

sentences.english: The two traditions have coexisted in the country, region, and generally within the same individual.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個傳統並存的國家，地區，一般在同一個人。

sentences.english: The guske music is played on traditional string instrument.
sentences.chinese: 卡搜音樂是在傳統的管絃樂器上彈奏的。

sentences.english: The Russian official assessed that Pyongyang was "hunkering down for a succession crisis.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯官員認爲朝鮮會堅守繼承的傳統。

sentences.english: The 1961 law forbidding dowries further undermined traditional Hinduism.
sentences.chinese: 1961年，法律更進一步地破壞印度教傳統的嫁妝。

sentences.english: Tingtzu loincloths are traditional garb for Yami males on Orchid Island.
sentences.chinese: 丁字褲是蘭嶼雅美男人的傳統服裝。

sentences.english: While traditional hot-spot issues remain unresolved, new conflicts break out from time to time.
sentences.chinese: 傳統熱點依舊，新的衝突時有發生。

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品販子擔心傳統音樂會的狀況。

sentences.english: Previous research on the definite article has been conventionally confined to the sentential level of language.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的英語定冠詞研究是在句子的層面上進行的。

sentences.english: Huangyuan now ranked in the traditional lamp based on skills and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 如今的湟源排燈在傳統技藝的基礎上又有了創新。

definition: one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
